title: "The Lighthouse Keeper" by Daisy Johnson
description: The story of a solitary life by the sea, and a woman’s courage. "The Lighthouse Keeper" is part of FEN: STORIES, available from Graywolf Press. Thanks to our presenting sponsor Audible. Start your free trial and get a free audiobook at audible.com/levar.
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
